subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: It is the season’s first club competition, and because it’s April, it begins to rain on Don, Gregg and Jon after a few holes. At the turn, Don decides to replace his driver for the back nine because his grip is extremely wet. Gregg goes to the pro shop to buy rain gloves to use on the back nine, and Jon stops to get a towel to wrap around the grips of his clubs while hitting his shots for the rest of the day. Who will be penalized on the back nine?.
